body_html:
Derp, for some reason I was thinking I needed to write more for the Args, then realised I just needed to write an explanation of what's going on. Done 👍 f is kind of redundant, but I've made it optional so despite the formula in the paper people can just ignore it.

Now just need someone to point out why those autograd tests are going wildly wrong...

body:
Derp, for some reason I was thinking I needed to write more for the `Args`, then realised I just needed to write an explanation of what's going on. Done :+1: `f` is kind of redundant, but I've made it optional so despite the formula in the paper people can just ignore it.

Now just need someone to point out why those autograd tests are going wildly wrong...
